name: Apex Colony
description:
An rogue-lite game where you control an lone ant that try to forming an super colony with the help various type of ants.

Is it recommed to read the "how to play?" and you could change keybind for your own liking in the setting.

Credits:

An thank to arongranberg for the a* path finding system. Get it here.

An thank to Raph Levien for the Inconsolata font.

The rest of programming and art are made by me (Huntrt)

Sound - None
